spell.name: Tranquilizing Toxin
entries: One target you choose within range must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 8d6} poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until the end of your next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is also {@condition stunned}. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half damage and is not {@condition poisoned}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the poison damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
